name: backend
description: Firebase backend system with Cloud Functions for storing and retrieving JSON documents

scripts.clean: rm -rf public && cd functions && rm -rf lib && cd ..
scripts.build:webapp: cd ../webapp && npm run build && cd ../firebase && ln -sf ../webapp/dist public
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webapp && cd functions && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && node scripts/generate-firebase-config.js && firebase emulators:start
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && node scripts/generate-firebase-config.js && (nodemon & NODE_ENV=development firebase emulators:start --import=./emulator-data --export-on-exit)
scripts.dev:with-data: rm -f *.log && npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && node scripts/generate-firebase-config.js && node scripts/start-with-data.js
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:functions: firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build && firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:rules: firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
